title: League MS High
body: Since the patch, my MS has been jumping from 30 to 400. It seems to only be League of legends which this problem occurs. Pubg has no issues. I've done speed tests and everything is fine and my download speeds are consistent. I've turned the firewall off and on and still have the issue. I've changed my settings in game and this hasnt fixed  anything. I've uninstalled and reinstalled and did a repair and nothing has changed. My internet is fine. Its just league where the MS is an issue.

replies.body: Ahh i'm not the only one.

👋🏽 Heya!

Sounds like your network is experiencing some hiccups on the way to the League servers, resulting in the ping spikes. It's possible to experience these issues with League alone.

[🌐Perform the steps listed in this article🌐](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let us know if you have a smooth gaming experience afterwards!
